subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.4 Maven Deployment
msgSnippet: Hi David, Not sure who has done it in the past but just found the following in the Maven upload JIRA instance so looks like it s already on it s way:
messageBody:
Hi David,

Not sure who has done it in the past but just found the following in the
Maven upload JIRA instance so looks like it's already on it's way:
http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MAVENUPLOAD-1651
http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MAVENUPLOAD-1651

Otherwise more details can be found at the links below:
- http://www.nabble.com/forum/ViewPost.jtp?post=11266245
- http://maven.apache.org/guides/mini/guide-central-repository-upload.html

Chanks
Casey

I'll just sit on this for a bit and see if anyone has already



dsaff wrote:

> Casey,
>
